channel.title: thoughts on single plot
channel.description: Recent content in thoughts on single plot

item.title: humanism is not at odds with technology
item.description: humanism is not at odds with technology # Like many, I often find myself associating modern technology with negative practices, be it social media, invasive advertising, electronic waste, privacy concerns - I could go on. It is easy to get caught up in these systems that are eroding our way of life, but I want to focus on the positive impacts of technology for a bit. Technology Positive Impact OpenStreetMap Provides accessible mapping data for everyone, enabling better navigation and community planning.

item.title: the crisis of our century
item.description: the crisis of our century # The largest crisis we face as a human race, global warming, is something that creeps up on you. It’s not immediately obvious in your day-to-day life, yet we can all feel its presence. We all swear this year was warmer than the last, yet a collective feeling of denial persists. We’ll be alright. Right? Some people will die, but that won’t be me, will it?
